name: Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity
name_original: Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity
description:
Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity is an adventure-arcade game developed by ICOM Simulations and Viacom New Media. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by Viacom New Media. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Beavis and Butt-Head in Virtual Stupidity is available on PlayStation and PC.
